description.value: You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead. You're always taking precautions when @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Avoid Notice]{Avoiding Notice}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hiding}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak]{Sneaking} to foil lifesense, and you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
